Class SampleSpeaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.speaker.AbstractSpeaker

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.media.SoundPool.OnLoadCompleteListener, Speaker

    public class SampleSpeaker
extends AbstractSpeaker
implements android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener
    Class that handles audio sample playing by using MediaPlayer.
